snippet: Dan Warthen, the Mets’ pitching coach, apologized for using a racial slur in the team’s spring training clubhouse.
abstract: New York Mets pitching coach Dan Warthen and general manager Sandy Alderson both apologize for Warthen's use of racial slur in spring training clubhouse.
